snippet: In affidavits in a lawsuit, former Senators Bob Graham and Bob Kerrey say they believe the Saudi government might have played a direct role in the attacks.
abstract: Former Senators Bob Graham and Bob Kerrey testify in sworn statements that they believe the Saudi government might have played a direct role in the Sept 11 attacks; affidavits are filed as part of a lawsuit brought against the Saudi government and dozens of institutions in the country by families of Sept 11 victims and others.
lead_paragraph: In affidavits in a lawsuit, former Senators Bob Graham and Bob Kerrey say they believe the Saudi government might have played a direct role in the attacks.

headline.seo: Ex-Senators Graham and Kerrey See Possible Saudi 9/11 Link
headline.main: Saudi Arabia May Be Tied to 9/11, 2 Ex-Senators Say
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia May Be Tied To 9/11, 2 Ex-Senators Say
